mapper.update: update personal_others set title=#{title},projectscan=#{projectscan} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};
update personal_introduceman set materialsname=#{materialsname},materialsadjunct=#{materialsadjunct} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_research_materials set starttime=#{starttime},stoptime=#{stoptime},workunit=#{workunit},job=#{job},jobcontent=#{jobcontent}, assistcertify=#{assistcertify} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_basic_message set unit=#{unit},unitlevel=#{unitlevel},personalidentitynature=#{personalidentitynature},reviewyear=#{reviewyear},name=#{name},nameformer=#{nameformer},sex=#{sex},nation=#{nation},idnumber=#{idnumber}, birthday=#{birthday},fillingtime=#{fillingtime},startworktime=#{startworktime},workingyears=#{workingyears},reviewmeeting=#{reviewmeeting},wantprofessionseries=#{wantprofessionseries},wantmajor=#{wantmajor}, wantmajorstatus=#{wantmajorstatus},executivefunction=#{executivefunction},executivefunctiontime=#{executivefunctiontime},executivefunctionexplatin=#{executivefunctionexplatin},phone=#{phone},email=#{email}, fileorganizationname=#{fileorganizationname},politicsstatus=#{politicsstatus},nativeplace=#{nativeplace},address=#{address},idcardfront=#{idcardfront},idcardcontrary=#{idcardcontrary},manphoto=#{manphoto} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_education set graduationtime=#{graduationtime},graduationschool=#{graduationschool},educationproject=#{educationproject},major=#{major},education=#{education},degree=#{degree},lengthofschooling=#{lengthofschooling}, educationid=#{educationid},educationdegreecredential=#{educationdegreecredential} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_major_experience set starttime=#{starttime},whereschoolwork=#{whereschoolwork},endtime=#{endtime},post=#{post},workunit=#{workunit},certifyman=#{certifyman},helpcertify=#{helpcertify} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_occupational_qualification set qualificationname=#{qualificationname},gettime=#{gettime},ratifyoffice=#{ratifyoffice},majorname=#{majorname},credentialnumber=#{credentialnumber},assistcertify=#{assistcertify} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_performance_achievement set performancename=#{performancename},starttime=#{starttime},stoptime=#{stoptime},projectlevel=#{projectlevel},projectcontent=#{projectcontent},personaleffect=#{personaleffect}, achievementeffect=#{achievementeffect},projectscan=#{projectscan},personalprojectscan=#{personalprojectscan},projectawardsscan=#{projectawardsscan} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_performance_awards set projectname=#{projectname},awardslevel=#{awardslevel},awardtime=#{awardtime},awardorganization=#{awardorganization},content=#{content},assistcertify=#{assistcertify} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_performance_patents set patentsname=#{patentsname},patentstype=#{patentstype},gettime=#{gettime},patentsintroduce=#{patentsintroduce},assistcertify=#{assistcertify} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};

update personal_reviewall set reviewdate=#{reviewdate}, review=#{review}, reviewstatusname=#{reviewstatusname}, reviewname=#{reviewname}, reviewlevel=#{reviewlevel}, createdate=#{createdate}, reviewhandintime=#{reviewhandintime},reviewstate=#{reviewstate} where PersonalUserid=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};
update personal_worksummary set worksummary=#{worksummary} where PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalUserid} and PersonalreviewID=#{PersonalreviewID};
